pullRequest.body:
Fix a missing edge case in the linter, when an option name
had only one component (as in the profiler option), and add a test.

At the same time, rewrite the linter to use the `name` API (much nicer!), and perform two small clean-ups to the test file.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

```suggestion
        if #[`pp, `profiler, `trace].contains name.getRoot then
```
Thanks for the pointer! Sadly, this doesn't work, as `parse_set_option` returns an `Ident`: I haven't been able to make it return a `name` instead.
Isn't there an `Ident.getId`?
Thanks for the pointer; I got it to work! Much nicer now!
Can you add a comment explaining this line?
Ah nevermind, the comment was already there!

```suggestion
def parse_set_option : Syntax ‚Üí Option Name
```
Right; I've rolled this into #14294.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - fix: setOption linter also recognises a bare `profiler` option
